sentence.text: I soon noticed that the car was being driven very dangerously .
Then off they went but I had noticed that Mrs Taylor was really crying .
You will notice that there is , in the wording of that letter , something curious .
Notice the street names in the centre of Bristol .
You may notice that food tastes different when you are pregnant .
` I do n't suppose anyone will even notice you 're not there .
Nobody even noticed I was in the room !
On the way he noticed how quiet the school seemed .
` Did you notice any knives lying about ? "
` I see you have noticed a certain peculiarity about my appearance . "
When examining the wound , I noticed a dark area at each end of the cut .
Users of the main car park at Park Royal will have noticed a new fence at the back of the site .
Then I noticed Alec at the other end of the bench .
Notice sounds from the world around .
As he stood on the first tee at New Orleans last week , he noticed a boy in a wheelchair .
` Their mother must have noticed a difference in them .
Out walking this morning I noticed Dr Greenslade on his rounds .
I notice a greasy smear on my glass .
Jules apparently noticed him for the first time .
He had hardly noticed its weight before .
